articles.title: Maryland Democrats protest prison housing ICE detainees
articles.description: GLEN BURNIE, Md. (AP) — Some Maryland candidates for local and state offices joined an immigration advocacy group to protest a county correctional center housing U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement detainees.

articles.title: Facial recognition was key in identifying US shooting suspect
articles.description: Facial recognition technology, which has drawn criticism from civil liberties activists in recent years, was used to identify the suspect in Thursday's newsroom shooting which left five dead in Annapolis, Maryland.
